thread.title: Claudio Ranieri sacked by Leicester City, but who will replace him? - latest news and reaction
thread.title_full: Claudio Ranieri sacked by Leicester City, but who will replace him? - latest news and reaction

author: Giles Mole
title: Claudio Ranieri sacked by Leicester City, but who will replace him? - latest news and reaction
text:
Claudio Ranieri sacked by Leicester City, but who will replace him? - latest news and reaction  28am Claudio Ranieri was sacked by Leicester after Sevilla defeat Craig Shakespeare and Mike Stowell will take interim charge Roberto Mancini is the bookies' favourites to replace Ranieri Leicester are currently one point above the relegation zone Ranieri has the fifth-highest win percentage of any PL manager Auto update 6:28AM Dilly Ding, Dilly Gone 
L ess than 10 months since Leicester completed one of most remarkable triumphs in sporting history, the club have parted company with a man they are sure to erect a statue to. 
Never mind dilly-ding dilly-dong; it is dilly-ding dilly-gone. And for many, Claudio Ranieri's departure highlights modern football at its worst. Claudio Ranieri has been sacked by Leicester Credit: REX FEATURES 
O n Feb 7, the club pledged their "unwavering support" to the manager that gave them the greatest days in their history. 
On Feb 23, Leicester now "reluctantly feel that a change of leadership, while admittedly painful, is necessary in the club's greatest interest". 
But who will this new leader be? Here are the main contenders...
